mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECIPE_REVIEW (RECIPE_REVIEW_ID, RECIPE_BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, RECIPE_REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_RATING) VALUES (RECIPE_REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{recipeBoardId}, #{memberId}, #{recipeReviewContent}, #{reviewRating})
mapper.select: SELECT r.RECIPE_REVIEW_ID, r.RECIPE_BOARD_ID, r.MEMBER_ID, r.RECIPE_REVIEW_CONTENT, r.REVIEW_RATING, r.RECIPE_REVIEW_DATE_CREATED, a.ATTACH_ID, a.ATTACH_PATH, a.ATTACH_REAL_NAME, a.ATTACH_CHG_NAME, a.ATTACH_EXTENSION, a.ATTACH_DATE_CREATED FROM ( SELECT RECIPE_REVIEW_ID, RECIPE_BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, RECIPE_REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_RATING, RECIPE_REVIEW_DATE_CREATED FROM ( SELECT r.*, ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT * FROM RECIPE_REVIEW WHERE RECIPE_BOARD_ID = #{recipeBoardId} ORDER BY RECIPE_REVIEW_ID DESC ) r WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pagination.end} ) WHERE RN >= #{pagination.start} ) r LEFT JOIN REVIEW_ATTACH a ON r.RECIPE_REVIEW_ID = a.RECIPE_REVIEW_ID ORDER BY r.RECIPE_REVIEW_ID
